data.prayer: Father, you desire the people in the state of Oaxaca who are far from you to hear about you.
data.verse: "Those who were not told about him will see, and those who have not heard will understand."

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Oaxaca, Mexico
data.section_summary: What people or resources could you pray for in this photo?

data.prayer: Lord, the the state of Oaxaca will disappear one day, but your Word will never disappear. Call all who claim Christianity to anchor their lives on your Word.
data.verse: Heaven and earth will disappear, but my words will never disappear.

data.prayer: Father, let love abound more and more in the church of Oaxaca, Mexico.
data.verse: And this is my prayer: that your love may abound more and more in knowledge and depth of insight

data.prayer: Jesus, please raise up evangelists to equip your people to share the gospel in Oaxaca.
data.verse: So Christ himself gave the apostles, the prophets, the evangelists, the pastors and teachers, to equip his people for works of service, so that the body of Christ may be built up

data.prayer: Lord, please remember the Japanese people. you said you wanted worshippers of every tongue and tribe and nation, yet we know of no worshippers among them.
Father, remind your church in Oaxaca that they can know and depend on the love you have for them.
data.verse: We know and have believed the love which God has for us. God is love, and he who remains in love remains in God, and God remains in him.

data.prayer: God, we pray both the men and women of Oaxaca, Mexico will find ways to meet in groups of two or three to encourage and correct one another from your Word.
Spirit, encourage the church in Oaxaca, Mexico to make the most of every opportunity.
data.verse: Be very careful, then, how you live—not as unwise but as wise, making the most of every opportunity, because the days are evil.
